The Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program provides critical funding to those in need of assistance. Although it helped over 160,000 MA residents for most of 2018, the Trump Administration has targeted MA with a 14% cut in low income heating assistance just as winter is coming

This week I joined my Congressional MA colleagues & sent a letter to the Department of Health and Human Services demanding to know why MA has received a steady decrease in federal funding that helps low-income households & seniors with their energy bills.  https://lynch.house.gov/sites/lynch.house.gov/files/MA%20Delegation%20LIHEAP%20Letter%20to%20HHS%202019.pdf …
